title: INFORMIT - Professional JavaScript Frameworks with CoffeeScript
description:
Professional JavaScript Frameworks with CoffeeScript LiveLessons is a complete video training course on the basics of building rich client side web applications using three of the most popular JavaScript web frameworks

What You Will Learn

* The basics of the Ember.js, AngularJS, and Backbone.js client-side web frameworks.

* Advanced JavaScript techniques, including dependency injection, test driven development, and prototypes.

* HTML5 features such as in browser SQLite databases, web workers, and the File API.


Who Should Take This Course

Developers looking to understand the differences between the top three client-side web frameworks, as well those looking to level up their JavaScript and HTML5 skills.


Course Requirements

* Basic understanding of programming and development

* Familiarity with JavaScript language

* Familiarity with jQuery

Year : 2013
